definition: to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control

sentences.english: Then, choose the persistence mapper component.
sentences.chinese: 然後，選擇持久性映射程序組件。

sentences.english: Contain long-lasting formula, which is wild and easy to apply color.
sentences.chinese: 蘊含持久配方，質地溫和易上色。

sentences.english: The long exhausting trip proved too abundance.
sentences.chinese: 這次旅行礦日持久，咱們都累倒了。

sentences.english: The special formulation of curliness make eyelash hold out for long time keep the curliness.
sentences.chinese: 獨特的旋翹配方使睫毛持久保持旋翹。

sentences.english: On Protracted War" is one of the important military theories."
sentences.chinese: 論持久戰》是重要軍事理論之一。

sentences.english: That gives the athletes an edge by increasing their oxygen levels and improving their endurance.
sentences.chinese: 這一切有利於提高運動員的氧水平和持久力。

sentences.english: These problems, if unsettled, will become lasting threats to security.
sentences.chinese: 這些問題不解決，將成爲持久的安全隱患。

sentences.english: In a country in which many people are illiterate, this is time-consuming.
sentences.chinese: 在一個大部分公民是文盲的國家，這將是曠日持久的。

sentences.english: Rigby also hopes the treatment will have a lasting success.
sentences.chinese: 裏格比也希望這種療法能有持久的成效。

sentences.english: And it is also noted, that love and envy do make a man pine, which other affections do not, because they are not so continual.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲沒有什麼能比愛與妒更具有持久的消耗力。

sentences.english: Paint twice or thrice to obtain permanent effect;
sentences.chinese: 如果要獲得持久防水效果，須塗兩至三遍。

sentences.english: Rustic pavers along a grassy path add a bit more permanence without blowing your budget.
sentences.chinese: 沿着草地的道路仿古磚添加您的預算沒有吹一點持久。

sentences.english: Injection-molded full-length polypropylene lasting board delivers maximum rigidity and support.
sentences.chinese: 注射成型全長聚丙烯持久板提供了最大的剛性和支持。

sentences.english: We will strive to conserve energy and reduce emissions.
sentences.chinese: 打好節能減排攻堅戰和持久戰。

sentences.english: The data architecture area is intended to capture the structure of persistent databases.
sentences.chinese: 數據體系結構區域用於捕獲持久型數據庫的結構。

sentences.english: On the palate, the flavours open up unrestrainedly and not without a certain balance and roundness which overwhelm us.
sentences.chinese: 品嚐的時候，味道持久地在口中蔓延開，平衡而圓潤。

definition: Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
